name: linter-phpcs
description: Lint PHP on the fly, using phpcs

executablePath.description: Enter the path to your phpcs executable.

autoExecutableSearch.title: Search for executables
autoExecutableSearch.description: Automatically search for any `vendor/bin/phpcs.bat` or `vendor/bin/phpcs` executable. Overrides the exectuable defined above.

disableExecuteTimeout.description: Disable the 10 second timeout on running phpcs

codeStandardOrConfigFile.description: Enter path to config file or a predefined coding standard name.

disableWhenNoConfigFile.description: Disable the linter when the default configuration file is not found.

autoConfigSearch.title: Search for configuration files
autoConfigSearch.description: Automatically search for any `phpcs.xml`, `phpcs.xml.dist`, `phpcs.ruleset.xml` or `ruleset.xml` file to use as configuration. Overrides custom standards defined above.

ignorePatterns.description: Enter filename patterns to ignore when running the linter.

displayErrorsOnly.description: Ignore warnings and display errors only.

warningSeverity.description: Set the warning severity level. Available when "Display Errors Only" is not checked.

tabWidth.description: Set the number of spaces that tab characters represent to the linter. Enter 0 to disable this option.
